name: verify_inflation_escalation
description: Verify cost escalation mechanics. Fixed costs (admin, marketing, maintenance, insurance, tech) escalate at fixedCostEscalationRate using (1+rate)^yearIndex. Variable costs (travel, IT licensing) escalate at inflationRate. If fixedCostEscalationRate is not set, it falls back to inflationRate.

fixedCostEscalationRate.description: Fixed cost escalation rate (decimal), null if not set

yearIndex.description: Year index (0-based) to verify escalation for

costType.description: Whether this is a fixed or variable cost

reportedEscalatedCost.description: The escalated cost reported by the application
